name: Ember Cub
description: A young fire beast with explosive potential.

name: Ember Lion
description: The evolved form of Ember Cub with a roaring burst of flames.

name: Aqua Sprite
description: A nimble water spirit that excels at defensive counters.

name: Tidal Guardian
description: A towering shield of water that absorbs incoming blows.

name: Terra Beetle
description: A sturdy earth warrior with a reinforced shell.

name: Quake Stag
description: A mighty evolution of Terra Beetle capable of shattering defenses.

name: Ignite Burst
description: Support: Choose an allied Fire creature. That creature gains +200 ATK while this support remains on the field.

name: Purge Beacon
description: Support: When activated, remove one card from an opponent's support slot. Can be played face-down but can only be activated if an opponent has at least one support.

name: Flame Aura
description: All Fire creatures you control gain +100 ATK for the remainder of the duel.

name: Blaze Fox
description: A cunning fire creature. Support Effect: When activated, draw 1 card.

name: Storm Hawk
description: A swift wind creature. Support Effect: All Fire creatures gain +100 ATK while this remains in support.

name: Mystic Serpent
description: An ancient water snake. Support Effect: When activated, remove one opponent support card.

name: Rock Golem
description: A massive stone guardian with no special abilities.

name: Void Wisp
description: A mysterious dark creature. Support Effect: Choose a Fire creature. That creature gains +200 ATK while this support remains.

name: Mirror Force
description: Trap: When an opponent's creature attacks, destroy all of their attack position creatures.

name: Blazing Strike
description: Deal 300 damage directly to your opponent. If you control a Fire creature, deal 500 damage instead.

name: Crystal Sprite
description: A delicate light creature with modest combat stats.
